        <tablename>sys_hub_action_type_base</tablename>
        <value><p>Esta acción clasifica los elementos solicitados de localización en función de la configuración de LF y el idioma de origen</p>

<p>
<b>Entradas: </b>
</p>
<ul>
<li>
<strong> ID de proyecto</strong>: ID de sistema del proyecto de localización
</li>
</ul>

<p>
<b>Salidas: </b>
</p>
<ul>
<li>
<strong>Grupos de elementos solicitados</strong>: lista de grupos de elementos solicitados de localización
</li>
</ul></value>
    </sys_translated_text>

        <section/>
        <step_type display_value="Script">106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7</step_type>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-05-14 08:21:26</sys_created_on>

    <sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=b6e54b620f4030106a2c6577b9767efe"/>
    <sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <document>sys_hub_step_instance</document>
        <document_key>b6e54b620f4030106a2c6577b9767efe</document_key>
        <order>600</order>
        <sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-05-14 08:21:27</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>7ae58b620f4030106a2c6577b9767e18</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-01-31 08:10:55</sys_updated_on>
        <value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
    var reqItemsGroupedBySettings = {};
    var requestedItemIds = new LFProjectUtils(inputs.project_id).getRelatedRequestedItemIds();
    var lfSettingUtils = new LFSettingUtils();
    for (var idx = 0; idx < requestedItemIds.length; idx++) {
        var requestedItemId = requestedItemIds[idx];
        var requestedItemUtils = new LFRequestedItemUtils(requestedItemId);
        var targetLanguageId = requestedItemUtils.getTargetLanguage();
        var artifactInternalName = requestedItemUtils.getArtifactConfigInternalName();
        var sourceLanguageCode = requestedItemUtils.getSourceLanguageCode();
        var settings = lfSettingUtils.getLFSetting(artifactInternalName, targetLanguageId);
        var lfSettingsKey = settings['sys_id'] + "_" + sourceLanguageCode;
        if (reqItemsGroupedBySettings.hasOwnProperty(lfSettingsKey)) {
            reqItemsGroupedBySettings[lfSettingsKey].requestedItems.push(requestedItemId);
        } else {
            reqItemsGroupedBySettings[lfSettingsKey] = {
                requestedItems: [requestedItemId],
                settingsConfigured: settings
            };
        }
    }
    var lfSettingsKeys = Object.keys(reqItemsGroupedBySettings);

    var requestedItemGroupsList = [];

    for (var idx = 0; idx < lfSettingsKeys.length; idx++) {
        var eachSettingKey = lfSettingsKeys[idx];
        var requestedItems = reqItemsGroupedBySettings[eachSettingKey]['requestedItems'];
        var settingsConfigured = reqItemsGroupedBySettings[eachSettingKey]['settingsConfigured'];

        var requestedItemDetails = {};
        requestedItemDetails['assignment_group'] = settingsConfigured['localization_fulfiller_group'];
        requestedItemDetails['auto_translation_mode'] = settingsConfigured['auto_translation_mode'];
        requestedItemDetails['enable_machine_translate'] = settingsConfigured['enable_machine_translate'];
        requestedItemDetails['enable_tms'] = settingsConfigured['enable_tms'];
        requestedItemDetails['enable_email'] = settingsConfigured['enable_email'];
        requestedItemDetails['enable_export_import'] = settingsConfigured['enable_export_import'];
        requestedItemDetails['translator_name'] = settingsConfigured['translator_name'];
        requestedItemDetails['tms_name'] = settingsConfigured['tms_name'];
        requestedItemDetails['tms_additional_info'] = settingsConfigured['tms_additional_info'];
        requestedItemDetails['email_subflow_name'] = settingsConfigured['email_subflow_name'];
        requestedItemDetails['email_format'] = settingsConfigured['email_format'];
        requestedItemDetails['default_recipients_list'] = settingsConfigured['default_recipients_list'];
        requestedItemDetails['export_format'] = settingsConfigured['export_format'];
        requestedItemDetails['translation_approver_group'] = settingsConfigured['translation_approver_group'];
        requestedItemDetails['business_approver_group'] = settingsConfigured['business_approver_group'];
        requestedItemDetails['workflow'] = settingsConfigured['workflow'];
        requestedItemDetails['enable_projects'] = settingsConfigured['enable_projects'];

        var maxRequestedItemsPerTask = parseInt(gs.getProperty("com.glide.sn_lf.max_requested_items_per_task", 150));
        var taskCountSettingsSourceLanguagePair = Math.ceil(requestedItems.length / maxRequestedItemsPerTask);

        for (var i = 0; i < taskCountSettingsSourceLanguagePair; i++) {
            var startIndex = i * maxRequestedItemsPerTask;
            var endIndex = Math.min(requestedItems.length, (i + 1) * maxRequestedItemsPerTask);
            var currentTaskRequestedItems = requestedItems.slice(startIndex, endIndex);
            requestedItemDetails['requested_item_ids'] = currentTaskRequestedItems;
            requestedItemGroupsList.push(JSON.stringify(requestedItemDetails));
        }
    }

    outputs.requested_item_groups = requestedItemGroupsList;

})(inputs, outputs);</value>
        <variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable>

        <description><p>This action categorizes localization requested items based on LF settings and source language</p>

<p>

</p>
<ul>
<li>
<strong> Project ID</strong> - Sys ID of the Localization Project

        <tablename>sys_hub_action_type_base</tablename>
        <value><p>Esta acción clasifica los elementos solicitados de localización en función de la configuración de LF y el idioma de origen</p>

<p>
<b>Entradas: </b>
</p>
<ul>
<li>
<strong> ID de proyecto</strong>: ID de sistema del proyecto de localización
</li>
</ul>

<p>
<b>Salidas: </b>
</p>
<ul>
<li>
<strong>Grupos de elementos solicitados</strong>: lista de grupos de elementos solicitados de localización
</li>
</ul></value>
    </sys_translated_text>

        <action display_value="Categorize Localization Requested Items">85e1b4610f4030106a2c6577b9767e6b</action>
        <cid>f79a43e9-1113-4268-adba-b965b1ec602c</cid>

        <step_type display_value="Script">106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7</step_type>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>

    <sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=72b0536a0f4030106a2c6577b9767e06"/>
    <sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <document>sys_hub_step_instance</document>
        <document_key>72b0536a0f4030106a2c6577b9767e06</document_key>
        <order>600</order>
        <sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-05-14 09:08:41</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>beb0536a0f4030106a2c6577b9767e1a</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-01-31 08:10:58</sys_updated_on>
        <value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
    var reqItemsGroupedBySettings = {};
    var requestedItemIds = new LFProjectUtils(inputs.project_id).getRelatedRequestedItemIds();
    var lfSettingUtils = new LFSettingUtils();
    for (var idx = 0; idx < requestedItemIds.length; idx++) {
        var requestedItemId = requestedItemIds[idx];
        var requestedItemUtils = new LFRequestedItemUtils(requestedItemId);
        var targetLanguageId = requestedItemUtils.getTargetLanguage();
        var artifactInternalName = requestedItemUtils.getArtifactConfigInternalName();
        var sourceLanguageCode = requestedItemUtils.getSourceLanguageCode();
        var settings = lfSettingUtils.getLFSetting(artifactInternalName, targetLanguageId);
        var lfSettingsKey = settings['sys_id'] + "_" + sourceLanguageCode;
        if (reqItemsGroupedBySettings.hasOwnProperty(lfSettingsKey)) {
            reqItemsGroupedBySettings[lfSettingsKey].requestedItems.push(requestedItemId);
        } else {
            reqItemsGroupedBySettings[lfSettingsKey] = {
                requestedItems: [requestedItemId],
                settingsConfigured: settings
            };
        }
    }
    var lfSettingsKeys = Object.keys(reqItemsGroupedBySettings);

    var requestedItemGroupsList = [];

    for (var idx = 0; idx < lfSettingsKeys.length; idx++) {
        var eachSettingKey = lfSettingsKeys[idx];
        var requestedItems = reqItemsGroupedBySettings[eachSettingKey]['requestedItems'];
        var settingsConfigured = reqItemsGroupedBySettings[eachSettingKey]['settingsConfigured'];

        var requestedItemDetails = {};
        requestedItemDetails['assignment_group'] = settingsConfigured['localization_fulfiller_group'];
        requestedItemDetails['auto_translation_mode'] = settingsConfigured['auto_translation_mode'];
        requestedItemDetails['enable_machine_translate'] = settingsConfigured['enable_machine_translate'];
        requestedItemDetails['enable_tms'] = settingsConfigured['enable_tms'];
        requestedItemDetails['enable_email'] = settingsConfigured['enable_email'];
        requestedItemDetails['enable_export_import'] = settingsConfigured['enable_export_import'];
        requestedItemDetails['translator_name'] = settingsConfigured['translator_name'];
        requestedItemDetails['tms_name'] = settingsConfigured['tms_name'];
        requestedItemDetails['tms_additional_info'] = settingsConfigured['tms_additional_info'];
        requestedItemDetails['email_subflow_name'] = settingsConfigured['email_subflow_name'];
        requestedItemDetails['email_format'] = settingsConfigured['email_format'];
        requestedItemDetails['default_recipients_list'] = settingsConfigured['default_recipients_list'];
        requestedItemDetails['export_format'] = settingsConfigured['export_format'];
        requestedItemDetails['translation_approver_group'] = settingsConfigured['translation_approver_group'];
        requestedItemDetails['business_approver_group'] = settingsConfigured['business_approver_group'];
        requestedItemDetails['workflow'] = settingsConfigured['workflow'];
        requestedItemDetails['enable_projects'] = settingsConfigured['enable_projects'];

        var maxRequestedItemsPerTask = parseInt(gs.getProperty("com.glide.sn_lf.max_requested_items_per_task", 150));
        var taskCountSettingsSourceLanguagePair = Math.ceil(requestedItems.length / maxRequestedItemsPerTask);

        for (var i = 0; i < taskCountSettingsSourceLanguagePair; i++) {
            var startIndex = i * maxRequestedItemsPerTask;
            var endIndex = Math.min(requestedItems.length, (i + 1) * maxRequestedItemsPerTask);
            var currentTaskRequestedItems = requestedItems.slice(startIndex, endIndex);
            requestedItemDetails['requested_item_ids'] = currentTaskRequestedItems;
            requestedItemGroupsList.push(JSON.stringify(requestedItemDetails));
        }
    }

    outputs.requested_item_groups = requestedItemGroupsList;

})(inputs, outputs);</value>
        <variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable>
